pages.stories.subtitle: Every artwork has a story. Dive deeper into the creative process behind each piece.
pages.stories.intro: Each story begins with a single drawing...
pages.stories.nostories: No stories available yet. Check back soon!

pages.tools.metadescription: Free tools for designers and artists inspired by Antoine Patraldo's work
pages.tools.title: Creative Tools
pages.tools.subtitle: Free resources for designers, artists, and creators. Extract color palettes, download wallpapers, and more.
pages.tools.intro: A selection of tools that inspire my process...
pages.tools.palettesdescription: Extract beautiful color palettes from artworks. Export for Photoshop, GIMP, CSS, and more.
pages.tools.wallpapersdescription: Download high-resolution artworks as wallpapers for your devices.
pages.tools.avatarcreatordescription: Create unique avatars by combining traits from different artworks.
pages.tools.stickersdescription: Download sticker sheets ready to print at home or professionally.
pages.tools.artryondescription: See how artworks look on your wall using augmented reality.
pages.tools.nftsdescription: Exclusive digital collectibles and blockchain art.
pages.tools.ctadescription: Tell me what creative tools you'd like to see! I'm always looking to support artists and designers.
pages.tools.palettes.title: Color Palettes
pages.tools.palettes.metaDescription: Explore color palettes extracted from Antoine Patraldo's daily sketchbook practice - one drawing each day, one story each week.
pages.tools.palettes.heading: Color Palettes from Daily Practice
pages.tools.palettes.subtitle: Every drawing carries its own color story. These palettes emerge from my daily sketchbook—one drawing each day, one story each week.
pages.tools.palettes.artistNote: Color is memory. Each palette here represents a day's observation—the light at a particular hour, the mood of a moment, the spontaneity of a creative impulse. These aren't designed color schemes; they're the authentic chromatic fingerprints of my daily practice.
pages.tools.palettes.step1Description: Each day begins with a drawing—an observation, a memory, or a moment captured in my sketchbook.
pages.tools.palettes.step2Description: The colors aren't planned; they emerge from the subject, the light, and the emotional tone of that day.
pages.tools.palettes.step3Description: Click any palette below to see the original artwork and download the colors in CSS, JSON, or GIMP/Inkscape format.
pages.tools.palettes.recentDescription: These palettes come from my latest sketchbook entries. Each set of colors tells the story of a single day's observation.
pages.tools.palettes.cardTitle: Discover the artwork behind these colors
pages.tools.palettes.ctaHeading: Want to see where these colors come from?
pages.tools.palettes.ctaDescription: Explore the full sketchbook to discover the stories, techniques, and creative process behind each palette.
pages.tools.wallpaperspagedescription: Download high-resolution artworks as wallpapers for your desktop, mobile, and tablet devices.

email.buttonNotWorking: If the button doesn't work, you can copy and paste the following link into your browser:
email.linkExpires: This link will expire in 24 hours.
email.ignoreIfNotRequested: If you didn't subscribe to these updates, you can ignore this email.
subscription.confirmedDescription: Your subscription to Antoine Patraldo's art updates has been confirmed.
subscription.confirmedMessage1: Thank you for subscribing to updates about my work.
subscription.confirmedMessage2: You'll receive occasional emails about new artworks, exhibitions, and studio news.
